name: Creative Problem Solving
description: Develop an analytical and creative approach to solving complex challenges.

levels.title: Defining the Problem
levels.objective: Accurately identify and articulate the root cause of a problem.
levels.description: Learn to look past symptoms to find underlying causes using techniques like the '5 Whys'.
practices: Apply the '5 Whys' technique to a current issue
Write a clear, one-sentence problem statement
Gather data before jumping to solutions

levels.title: Generating Solutions
levels.objective: Brainstorm and evaluate multiple potential solutions.
levels.description: Practice divergent thinking to generate options, then convergent thinking to select the best one.
practices: Force yourself to come up with at least 5 solutions for a problem
Use mind mapping to explore connections
Evaluate solutions based on feasibility and impact

levels.title: Implementation & Iteration
levels.objective: Execute a solution and adapt based on feedback.
levels.description: Learn to plan an implementation, monitor results, and pivot if necessary.
practices: Create an action plan for a solution
Define metrics for success before starting
Conduct a post-mortem review after a project
